DOC.brief_summary: This blinded cross-over study aim to evaluate the efficacy and the pharmacokinetics of a previously reported liposome-encapsulated mepivacaine formulations.
DOC.brief_title: Local Anesthetics New Formulations: From Development to Clinical Tests
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers were free from cardiac, hepatic, renal, pulmonary, neurological, gastrointestinal and haematological diseases, psychiatric disorders and allergy to local anesthetics
